props.name: checked
props.docblock: (`Boolean`): `true` if the state should be checked, `false` otherwise. This prop can be used to manage the Checkbox more directly, overriding the default Checkbox checked state.

description.text: (`Boolean`): `true` if the state should be checked, `false` otherwise. This prop can be used to manage the Checkbox more directly, overriding the default Checkbox checked state.

props.name: onChange
props.docblock: (`Boolean`): `true` if the checkbox should be disabled, `false` otherwise

description.text: (`Boolean`): `true` if the checkbox should be disabled, `false` otherwise

props.name: inputRef
props.docblock: function to be called when the checkbox changes state

description.text: function to be called when the checkbox changes state
